etymologies: mid 19th century; earliest use found in Proceedings of the Boston Society of Natural History. From ancient Greek ζεύγλη strap or loop of a yoke + -odont, after scientific Latin Zeuglodon Zeuglodon

definitions: An extinct cetacean of, or related to, the former genus Zeuglodon.
Of or relating to extinct cetaceans of the former genus Zeuglodon; designating such a cetacean.
